verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>;

Unto <S%G5095>Timothy<s%>, my <S%G1103>own<s%> <S%G5043>son<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%>, <S%G1656>mercy<s%>, and <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G2531>As<s%> I <S%G3870>besought<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> to abide <S%G4357>still<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>, when I <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> thou mightest <S%G3853>charge<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> that they <S%G2085>teach<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> other <S%G2085>doctrine<s%>,

<S%G3366>Neither<s%> give <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G3454>fables<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G562>endless<s%> <S%G1076>genealogies<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G3930>minister<s%> <S%G2214>questions<s%>, <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G2316>godly<s%> <S%G3620>edifying<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>: so do.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of the <S%G3852>commandment<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G26>charity<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G505>unfeigned<s%>:
From <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> having <S%G795>swerved<s%> have turned <S%G1624>aside<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> vain <S%G3150>jangling<s%>;

<S%G2309>Desiring<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> teachers of the <S%G3547%G3361>law<s%>; <S%G3539>understanding<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> they <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4012%G5101>whereof<s%> they <S%G1226>affirm<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G2570>good<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G3545>lawfully<s%>;

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2749>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2749>made<s%> for a righteous <S%G1342>man<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> for the <S%G459>lawless<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G506>disobedient<s%>, for the <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> for <S%G268>sinners<s%>, for <S%G462>unholy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G952>profane<s%>, for murderers of <S%G3964>fathers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> murderers of <S%G3389>mothers<s%>, for <S%G409>manslayers<s%>,

For <S%G4205>whoremongers<s%>, for them that defile themselves with <S%G733>mankind<s%>, for <S%G405>menstealers<s%>, for <S%G5583>liars<s%>, for perjured <S%G1965>persons<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> if there be <S%G1536>any<s%> other <S%G2087>thing<s%> that is <S%G480>contrary<s%> to <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%>;

<S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> was committed <S%G4100>to<s%> <S%G1473>my<s%> <S%G4100>trust<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G2192%G5485>thank<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> hath <S%G1743>enabled<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G3754>for<s%> that he <S%G2233>counted<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%>, putting <S%G5087>me<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry<s%>;

<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G4386>before<s%> a <S%G989>blasphemer<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G1376>persecutor<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5197>injurious<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> I obtained <S%G1653>mercy<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G4160>did<s%> it <S%G50>ignorantly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G570>unbelief<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was exceeding <S%G5250>abundant<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

This is a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G594>acceptation<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>; of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4413>chief<s%>.

<S%G235>Howbeit<s%> for <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> I obtained <S%G1653>mercy<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> might shew <S%G1731>forth<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%>, <S%G4314>for<s%> a <S%G5296>pattern<s%> to them which should <S%G3195>hereafter<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> unto the <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G165>eternal<s%>, <S%G862>immortal<s%>, <S%G517>invisible<s%>, the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, be <S%G5092>honour<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

<S%G5026>This<s%> <S%G3852>charge<s%> I <S%G3908>commit<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G5043>son<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4394>prophecies<s%> which went <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4754>thou<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> mightest <S%G4754>war<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4752>warfare<s%>;

<S%G2192>Holding<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%>; <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> having put <S%G683>away<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> have made <S%G3489>shipwreck<s%>:

Of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5211>Hymenaeus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G223>Alexander<s%>; <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto <S%G4567>Satan<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G3811>learn<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G987>blaspheme<s%>.
